Suleiman from Jbeil: I said before that they can boycott the president but they can not isolate him, threats and intimidation will not make the president's decision different from what it was

The threats will not make the president's decision any different. The maximum that can be done is to lock the president in prison and prevent him from telling the truth, but I will go out and continue

Today we celebrate our August 30 victory with a really big enthusiasm.
Today, there is a youth walking from the footsteps of the martyrs of praise. There is a youth who is looking at the future confidently by taking inspiration from history.
This youth is not with stone, stick, or molotov. A young man with a book in hand, a bookkeeper walking boldly in his heart.
This youth is not a pawn to terrorist organizations, but a youth walking on the path of Alpaslan, Mustafa Kemal, Mehmet Akif.
Literary, adjective, moral self-acquiring, reading, and most importantly inspired by our martyrs youth.
